havy refactoring: moved many static functions to row-member functions

2005-10-27
!!New Dataset Architecture 
cs/vb codegeneration enhanced xsd.exe is no longer needed
	* allow modifications of xxxdatatable and xxxxdatarow through inheritance
		* The dataset defines _xxxdatatable and _xxxxdatarow instead of xxxdatatable and xxxxdatarow 
		* There are external userclasses xxxdatatable and xxxxdatarow wich inherit from dataset._xxxdatatable and dataset._xxxxdatarow. 
		* The dataset generetas its internal objects from the external userclasses xxxdatatable and xxxxdatarow 
		* The external userclasses xxxdatatable and xxxxdatarow can be modified by the softwaredevelopper 
	* add class and property comments from RelationalDatastructure . This will allow ndoc to create api dokumentation.
